Cherrycake\Image::createSizeFilesFromFile

createSizeFilesFromFile

Creates the image files from the given $sourceFileName as specified by the setup sizes. The object must be loaded with the proper configurations in order to work.

    Signature

    public function createSizeFilesFromFile(string $sourceFileName )

    Parameters

    $sourceFileName — string
    The source image file, must include any required path (absolute or relative) and extension

    Returns

    boolean
    True if all files creation has gone ok, false otherwise
